sentences.sContent: Steven’s still in bed with flu .
sentences.sCn: 史蒂文患了流感，仍卧病在床。

sentences.sContent: I couldn’t go because I had flu .
Doctors now fear a flu epidemic .
sentences.sCn: 医生现在担心会出现流感大爆发。

phrases.pCn: 流感疫苗；预防针；感冒疫苗

trans.tranOther: a common illness that makes you feel very tired and weak, gives you a sore throat, and makes you cough and have to clear your nose a lot
